last_episode_to_air.name: The Penthouse Showdown
last_episode_to_air.overview: Showdown in Dubai: Boss Firas trusts his four protégés one last time!The four agents prove themselves one last time, overcome the biggest challenge of their careers, and demonstrate team spirit. Who will come out on top? Who will fall behind?

name: Dream Deals
overview: Dubai, the city of big real estate deals! We follow four German expats - Valeria, Sarah, Louisa and Edwin - as they work in one of the desert city's biggest real estate agencies. They are united by their dream of wealth, which they can quickly achieve by closing a mega-deal. Under the guidance of their demanding boss, they will not shy away from any challenge.

episodes.name: Success is a Decision
episodes.overview: Fierce competition for a million-dollar deal - It girl Valeria gets the chance to sell a mega property in front of her rival Sarah. Along with her team colleague Edwin, Sarah organizes one of her famous open house viewings, during which an unexpected guest turns up. Newcomer Louisa is having a hard time. Firas notices this and doesn't hesitate to take action.

episodes.name: Business, Parties and Big Dreams
episodes.overview: VIP agent Valeria receives a wake-up call. Between new contacts, fancy cars, and breathtaking real estate, it's easy to lose sight of the essentials. The competition between the four agents intensifies. Louisa receives serious news that could end her career. All agents realize that the big money won't wait for them; they have to fight for it.

episodes.name: It's All About Who You Know
episodes.overview: Major mood shift in real estate paradise! The four agents fail to perform and get summoned to a team-building event by boss Firas. Valeria invites her contacts to a big yacht party. Louisa continues to be coached by Bushido. Edwin feels the desire for freedom, and between Sarah and Valeria, becomes more aware of the fact that there can only be one alpha female.

episodes.name: Choose Your Enemies Wisely
episodes.overview: Revenge is sweet: Anyone who gets in Sarah's way will feel the consequences. She takes her own steps to strike a blow against rival Valeria, who is innocently awaiting the day of her big yacht party. Edwin relies blindly on his male intuition, unwary of the effect this could have on him and his team partner, Sarah. Louisa receives a phone call that could change everything for her.

episodes.name: The Yacht Aftermath
episodes.overview: After Sarah's ice-cold move against Valeria, Queen V straightens her crown and confronts Sarah. Edwin and Sarah's bond begins to crumble. Meanwhile, Louisa prepares for a crucial listing with her new client - German entrepreneur Saygin Yalçin.

episodes.name: The Penthouse Showdown
episodes.overview: Showdown in Dubai: Boss Firas trusts his four protégés one last time!The four agents prove themselves one last time, overcome the biggest challenge of their careers, and demonstrate team spirit. Who will come out on top? Who will fall behind?
